fields.creator: Creator
fields.description: **{{username}}** is a Discord bot built for **Music Streaming**. Powered by [discord.js](https://github.com/discordjs/discord.js) for interacting with the [Discord API](https://discord.com/developers/docs/intro) and [Lavalink](https://github.com/lavalink-devs/lavalink) for audio streaming.

options.member: Choose a member to include in the event.

grab.description: Sends the currently playing song to your DMs.
grab.DMfailed: I couldn‚Äôt send a DM. Make sure direct messages are enabled.

loop.description: Loop the current track or the entire queue.

lyrics.description: View lyrics for the currently playing track.

nowplaying.description: Show the track that‚Äôs currently playing.

playpause.description: Play or pause the current track.

ping.description: üèì Pong! Shows the bot's response time.

play.description: Play songs or tracks from available sources.

options.query: Song name or URL to play.

options.file: The audio file you want to play.

reload.owner: Sorry, you‚Äôre not the application owner and cannot use this command.

remove.description: Remove a track from the queue.

search.description: Search for tracks matching a query.

options.query: The tracks you want to search for.

seek.description: Seek to a specific time in the track.

skip.description: Skip the current track or jump to a specific one in the queue.

options.number: The index of the track to skip to.

stop.description: Stop the music and clear the queue.
